title: Constant issues with call drop off and connectivity on since owning a brand new Pixel 3
content:
Purchased in November.
Reported issue of call drops in November.
Vodafone Australia notified that they cannot replace phone but once tested and if they find an issue they may provide me with a refurbished phone(absolutely disgusting).
Actions taken so far:
1. Tested phone to check if any network issues - no problem. Problem continues 
2. Removed VOLTE - problem still continues.
It's 6 months and I have paid for a premium product only for Vodafone to say 1. They don't think anything is wrong.
2. Even if it something is wrong I will get a refurbished phone.
I am paying full price and I get a refurbished phone if they cannot fix.
That is the difference between a Google and Apple phone.
Don't get me wrong I love the phone .... but it just does not do the basic function of making and receiving calls.
I have lost friends via arguments, business opportunities because of this piece of **** phone.
I need help and and need to ascertain if anyone reads this support desk message.
I am frustrated to say the least. 
Please contact me on this email.

Regards,
Dylan
